title: No option to update to beta client
body: As title says, I don't get an option to update to beta client in the launcher, and didn't get a prompt to upgrade to beta client when I patched. Any way i can still get it?

replies.body:
The Beta Client hasn't rolled out on NA just yet. Sit tight and you should see the upgrade mentioned in the patcher when it's available.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1TIEyOx5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-11T03:29:17.334+0000)
>
> The Beta Client hasn't rolled out on NA just yet. Sit tight and you should see the upgrade mentioned in the patcher when it's available.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks, I was confused about this as well.
